price: y a todos los habitantes de la Tierra con tal de salvarse.
arabic: وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan thumma yunjīhi
